item.title: Megan add a quote by Federico Fellini
item.description: "All art is autobiographical; the pearl is the oyster's autobiography." -- Federico Fellini

item.title: Megan add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Megan add a quote by Margaret Young
item.description: "Often people attempt to live their lives backwards, they try to have more things or more money in order to do more of what they want so that they will be happier. The way it actually works is the reverse. You must first be who you really are then do what you need to do in order to have what you want. " -- Margaret Young

item.title: Megan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The intuitive mind is a sacred gift and the rational mind is a faithful servant. We have created a society that honors the servant and has forgotten the gift." -- Albert Einstein
